title: Create Ember/Ash Particle System
focus: All criteria implemented - ember particle system ready for integration

criteria.text: Particles float upward with random drift
criteria.notes: Particles have upward velocity (0.8-1.5 m/s) with horizontal drift and sinusoidal wobble
Random lifetime 2-4 seconds with smooth fade via lifetime decay
Pipeline uses SrcAlpha/One additive blending with HDR emissive colors (2.0+)
MAX_PARTICLES=1024, GPU instancing with storage buffer, minimal per-particle overhead
particles.rs compiles without errors; pre-existing errors in building_physics.rs/morale.rs are unrelated

checklist.item: Read spec.md and understand billboard rendering
Implement soft circle fragment with fade

worker_notes: Ember/Ash Particle System implemented. Created shaders/ember_particle.wgsl with billboard vertex shader and soft circle fragment shader. Created engine/src/render/particles.rs with GpuParticle (32 bytes), Particle, ParticleUniforms, and ParticleSystem structs. System supports spawning up to 1024 particles with GPU instancing. Particles float upward with random drift and fade out over 2-4 seconds. Additive blending (SrcAlpha/One) creates glow effect. Tests included. Pre-existing errors in building_physics.rs are unrelated to this story.

notes_history.note: Implemented full ember particle system with billboard shader, GPU instancing, and spawn/update logic

iteration_history.action: Created ember particle shader and Rust module with full implementation

learnings: Billboard rendering extracts right/up vectors from view matrix columns
GPU instancing with storage buffer avoids vertex buffer per-particle overhead
Additive blending with HDR colors (>1.0) creates natural glow effect
